experience: You and Robin both know Sergey Zaytsev, Scott Kelly, and 35 others

We all have scars. Whether they be physical or emotional, they do exist. Those scars are reminders of what we have faced and how we have managed to get beyond those times. Life can be overwhelming, but we can endure. No matter what happens, don't allow yourself to stay down. Pick yourself up, fight back. Don't let it break you. You deserve better, you are worth it!                                                                           #believeinyourself #nofear #facechallenges #positivevibes #believeinyou #youareworthit #youdeserveit #iamworthit #ideservebetter #selfworth #selfcare #selfesteem #selflove #selfrespect #youcandoit  #perserverance #writer #speaker #author #lifecoach #valueyourownselfworth @valueyourownselfworth #iamthefire #robincote #robincoteauthor #authorrobincote #getrealwithrobincote #getrealwithrobin @AuthorRobinCote

Your energy is important. Your health and outlook are important. Who you surround yourself with does make a difference. Being around negativity and toxic people will drain you. We can't control how people act but we can control who we spend our time around. Do yourself a favor, always protect your energy. Don't allow others to destroy your inner peace. Walk away from negativity and toxic people. You'll see the difference once you distance yourself from them. You deserve better, you are worth it!                                                           #selfcare #selfworth #selflove #selfesteem #selfrespect #notoxicity #nonegativityallowed #walkaway #innerpeace  #nonegativity #letgo  #valueyourownselfworth @valueyourownselfworth  #writer #speaker #lifecoach #iamthefire #robincote #author #authorrobincote #robincoteauthor #getrealwithrobincote #getrealwithrobin @AuthorRobinCote
